title: Thoughts on Fizz's W changes?
body:
So basically, you activate the higher health they are right? So that it runs out when they are low and the execute damage comes in?

Has anyone played Fizz in Ranked? Is he still good?

replies.body: nah no ones played fizz anymore. does he even exist?
i take it thats sarcasm? lel i mean ap fizz mid

AP fizz can still one shot people, but because of how his W changed to his Active for the %missing health damage, he changed to an auto based champion, sure he can still be played as AP, but it's just not worth it, cause your not procing the active on the W as much as you want to be.

This said the change that is being made;

 PASSIVE DAMAGE (OVER TIME)~~20/30/40/50/60 + (0.45 ability power) over 3 seconds~~ ⇒ 20/30/40/50/60 (0.45 ability power) + 4/5/6/7/8% of target's missing health over 3 seconds
ACTIVE DAMAGE (ON-HIT)~~10/20/30/40/50 + 4/5/6/7/8% of target's missing health over 3 seconds~~ ⇒ 10/20/30/40/50 + (0.25 ability power)

Means the damage is back to his over time damage, this probably benefits AP fizz (less autoing is done with AP) more then AD fizz (AD fizz is being neutered to say the least), but fact is due to his ult granting 20% scaling to ALL damage done by fizz, AD is always going to be more efficent as AD sustains damage and deals more over the time of the ult then you can with straight AP

While this is true, the 20% damage amplification means you can kill anyone anytime with AD Fizz OR AP Fizz. Unless you're ulting Maokai... But why the f*** would you be ulting Maokai anyway xD I'm still a really big fan of AP Fizz and I really miss it. Albeit it was slightly broken before changes, I just hope this makes AP Fizz at least decent again.

AP fizz can't kill straight tanks that have high (or even moderate) MR even with the ult, whereas AD fizz is built TO kill tanks, and because of bullshit bases, can also kill squishys.

AP fizz's main fall off is that he used to be able to kill anyone any time he had DFG or ult, now he can only kill them with ult, and be slightly annoying without ult (i'm talking non-fed laning phase fizz).

AD fizz is still the main pain in the ass, AP fizz is manageable.
